edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.classproject

Interface GridMember

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EmptyMember, Entity, ExtraBullet, Invincibility, NinjaOctopi, PowerUp, Radar, Room, Taha, TrueRoom

    public interface GridMember
    Here we have the GridMember class that contains a string which represents the object in the array of objects. There is an ImageIcon for the gui version, but the gui has not been completed in time.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isSeen()
      The isSeen method is a boolean that when true, the object that is being seen will be revealed on the grid.
      boolean isSomething()
      The isSomething method is a boolean that is anything that exists on the grid with the exception of the empty member object.
      void resetSee()
      The resetSee method will change everything that isSeen to false, this is here to make sure the player doesn't have sight on something they're not supposed to.
      void see()
      The see method is a method that sets the isSeen boolean to true whenever something is within range of the player.
      javax.swing.ImageIcon toImage()
      The toImage method is similiar to the toString method, but will display an image when used in the GUI.
      java.lang.String toString()
      The toString method will display the object as a string in the array of objects.

    • Method Detail

      • toString

        java.lang.String toString()
        The toString method will display the object as a string in the array of objects. Each class that implements this class is represented as something between to brackets.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object

      • toImage

        javax.swing.ImageIcon toImage()
        The toImage method is similiar to the toString method, but will display an image when used in the GUI.

      • isSeen

        boolean isSeen()
        The isSeen method is a boolean that when true, the object that is being seen will be revealed on the grid. If false, then the object is not seen and will be represented as a star.

      • isSomething

        boolean isSomething()
        The isSomething method is a boolean that is anything that exists on the grid with the exception of the empty member object. The object being something makes it easier to interact with one another when the player moves into something.

      • see

        void see()
        The see method is a method that sets the isSeen boolean to true whenever something is within range of the player.

      • resetSee

        void resetSee()
        The resetSee method will change everything that isSeen to false, this is here to make sure the player doesn't have sight on something they're not supposed to.
